      • replaceHolders

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> replaceHolders(int index,
                                                   java.util.List<java.lang.String> list,
                                                   java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> newList,
                                                   me.lactem.pvz.game.Game game)
        Replaces placeholders surrounded by "<>" such as map and status in one list of lore. See updateDesc(Game).
        Parameters:
        index - the index to be replaced in the list
        list - the old list to replace from
        newList - the new list that will be added to with replaced placeholders
        game - the game that the item belongs to
        Returns:
        the new lore of an item in the game inventory
